item.title: AWS CDK(v2): Execute Lambda by Cron
item.description: Using CDK, you can easily schedule Lambda to run using EventBridge. We will use the so-called cron method to describe the schedule. One thing to be a little careful about is that a rule can be triggered multiple times in response to a single event. (From Official Troubleshooting). If you can manage that, it is very easy and useful. HowTo For example, if you want to call myLambda every 10 minutes, you can write it as follows.
